thread.title: Arsenal news: Jorge Sampaoli Sevilla contract situation alerts Gunners and Barcelona | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal news: Jorge Sampaoli Sevilla contract situation alerts Gunners and Barcelona | Metro News

author: Mark Brus For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal news: Jorge Sampaoli Sevilla contract situation alerts Gunners and Barcelona | Metro News
text:
Arsenal on alert as Jorge Sampaoli delays signing new Sevilla contract gossip Mark Brus for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 9:11 am Jorge Sampaoli has impressed at Sevilla (Picture: Getty) 
Arsenal and Barcelona are reportedly on alert for the potential availability of highly-rated manager Jorge Sampaoli as he delays signing a new contract with current club Sevilla. Keep smiling! Mourinho of all people melts hearts with touching message to Ranieri 
The Argentine tactician has impressed with his work in La Liga this season, having landed the job on the back of four years of strong work with the Chile national team. 
Sampaoli has previously claimed he was also approached by Chelsea in the summer, before they eventually opted for Antonio Conte, and it seems top clubs could be ready to battle it out for him again. Sampaoli has been linked with Arsenal and Barcelona (Picture: Getty) 
Arsene Wengerâ€™s position at Arsenal is in some doubt as his contract expires at the end of the season, and the Daily Mirror claim Sampaoli could be one of the contenders to replace the Frenchman at the Emirates Stadium. Sampaoli Sevilla record
